I am petitioning the government to actively promote England & the English culture in a positive light by creating a Minister for England & an English Office which would bring us into line with the rest of the U.K.

To take back the Cross of Saint George from extremists & racists & fly it proudly alongside the Union Flag from all civic & muinicipal buildings as Scotland & Wales do with their flags.

To advertise England commercially as a specific country especially in tourism where England's identity is separate from other nations withing the United Kingdom which would hopefully encourage local investment, create jobs & raise revenue which could be reinvested back into England

Also I petition the government to proscribe Anglophobia & treat it like any other form of discrimination & hate crime.  England is a nation of over 50 million so its about time we had a voice & respect.

End Anglophobia Right Now
